DESCRIPTION: This card can be upgraded any number of times.
This card can be upgraded any number of times. Each upgrade is progressively better.
Downgrading a card undoes the effects of any #yUpgrades that have been applied to it.
Whenever you take Attack damage, reduce the damage by #b25% and lose 1 #yWeb.
Paralyzed enemies attack #b1 less time when multi-attacking.
Increases damage taken from Attacks. Reduced by half each turn.
#yPotion NL Deal 10 damage to an enemy.
#yPotion NL Deal 20 damage to an enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies.
#yPotion NL Deal 25 damage to ALL enemies.
